about_the_game:
A free-to-play 2D Rhythm-based action game where you don't have to be on the beat but rather have to dodge the beats in a certain way. Compete with the world with global leaderboard and be number 1 in all difficulties: Easy, Hard and Impossible!? Take a deep dive into this retro-type game which promotes local musicians' tracks and select over 5+ tracks to play the game on. Full controller support lets you feel the game mechanics and lets you go off on the songs while dodging the beats. Don't forget, it has 3 difficulties and every difficulty comes with a unique mechanic embedded into the game. TRY THEM ALL!

All the songs are from local artists and promote their music

name: Pentagons Go WEEE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 9800
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
